definitions.definition: The Chinese tropical fruit tree Litchi chinensis , of the soapberry family.
That tree's bright red oval fruit with a single stone surrounded by a fleshy white aril .
A soft pink- red colour , like that of a lychee rind (also called lychee red).

main_definition: The Chinese tropical fruit tree Litchi chinensis , of the soapberry family.
secondary_definitions: That tree's bright red oval fruit with a single stone surrounded by a fleshy white aril .
( uncountable ) A soft pink- red colour , like that of a lychee rind (also called lychee red).
